com.ctb.control.validation
Interface Validator

public interface Validator

Validator.java

Author:
Nate_Cohen Validates platform requests by confirming that the user is allowed to make the request and that the operands, if any, specify data which is properly visible to that user

Validate the request

Parameters:
operator - - the request actor, typically a user name
operand - - the data on which the operation is requested
action - - the operation which the operator wants to perform
